ygData.subject: Re: Exciting News!
ygData.msgSnippet: First, yes.  The weapon sketches were (SADLY) a hoax.  The person who did it confessed, as well as the images that were taken were doctored.  Ahh well, we can
ygData.messageBody:
First, yes. The weapon sketches were (SADLY) a hoax. The person who did it
confessed, as well as the images that were taken were doctored. Ahh well,
we can hope.

But also, on the sewing kit. If your at the forge in Kelethin, go down the
ramp you used to get up to it, and the NPC right in front of you is the one
that has the sewing kit things. The thimble mold and the needle mold. Be
aware that of course the sewing kit is also a "backpack", so be prepared for
it.

Haijar the Mage Blacksmith
